article_text:
Time magazine is coming down hard on President Obama with this chilling cover summarizing his failure in rolling out the Affordable Care Act:

The broken pill perhaps grasps perfectly how some Americans are feeling about website glitches and insurance policy cancellations despite the president's previous pledge that people could keep their existing coverage.
